items.content_html:
3 batteries walk into a bar: LG: I’ll have (reboot) I’ll Have (reboot) I’ll have… Apple: I ‘  l  l    h  a  v  e  . . . Samsung: I’ll 🔥

Batteries are hard to get right.
Yep, I’m just here trying to figure out how custom module maps work in Xcode project. How’s your Friday night going?
Who says you can’t make an endlessly confusing box for a computer monitor?
GitHub cracks me up. Every time I add a comment, it says that I commented “a minute from now”. I guess dates are hard or something.

Got word tonight that my grandma is starting hospice care. She had a stroke a month after my wedding and has been effectively “gone” for about 6 years. It still hurts, though. I’m very much looking forward to Revelation 21:4 being fulfilled.
I love being able to tune into work meetings r motley. I can keep up to date while on my commute home. And it’s awesome!

I’m watching the latest Swift Talk from the Objc.io guys, and they are refactoring some layout code using UIOffset to introduce spacing. I’ve never heard of that type before! I love watching stuff like this even for no other reason than to learn little things like this.
It’s really fun to use the Deliveries app to track the crazy route my new monitor has taken to get from New Jersey to Seattle. Tomorrow I receive it!
Didn’t realize that Star Trek: Discovery came back today. Guess I’ve got my show to watch on the bus in the morning!
